q1.name: Volcanic Rupture
description: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Ornn''' slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within its path and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 40% for 2 seconds.
After {{fd|1.125}}-seconds, a magma pillar then erupts at its ending point, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} enemies within and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
''The pillar will not expire while '''Ornn''' is {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn|charging}}.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing physical damage to enemies within its path and slowing them by 40% for 2 seconds.
After 1.125-seconds, a magma pillar then erupts at its ending point, knocking aside enemies within and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
The pillar will not expire while Ornn is charging.
q1.notes:
* The fissure will move an 200 units beyond the first champion it hits, not exceeding the maximum range of the ability. ''It can still damage additional targets.''
* If launched in a wall, pillar will try to appear on the other side of the wall, if it cannot the pillar will be destroyed.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the {{tip|airborne|knock aside}} from the magma pillar forming.
* ''Volcanic Rupture'' will fire from wherever '''Ornn''' was at the start of the cast time.

w1.name: Bellows Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' marches in the target direction for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, gaining {{tip|displacement immunity}}, becoming {{tip|lockout|unable to act}}, and reducing his {{sti|movement speed|{{as|movement speed}}}} by 35% for the duration.
Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.15}} seconds to enemies within. The final bout of flame will apply {{tip|Brittle}} for 3 seconds.
''Bellows Breath'' has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to {{tip|minion|minions}}. {{tip|Monster|Monsters}} take modified damage as well.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn marches in the target direction for 0.75 seconds, gaining displacement immunity, becoming unable to act, and reducing his movement speed by 35% for the duration.
Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage every 0.15 seconds to enemies within. The final bout of flame will apply Brittle for 3 seconds.
Bellows Breath has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to minions. Monsters take modified damage as well.
leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|12 to 16}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{as|{{ap|12/5 to 16/5}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}

{{st|Total Minimum/Minion Damage|{{ap|80 to 280}}|Minimum/Minion Damage Per Instance|{{ap|80/5 to 280/5}}}}
{{st|Total Monster Damage|{{ap|155 to 255}}|Monster Damage Per Instance|{{ap|155/5 to 255/5}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will negate the final instance of damage and prevents {{tip|Brittle}} from being applied.
* '''Ornn''' can see the on-target VFX on targets that are being struck even while they are in the [[Sight|fog of war]].
* '''Ornn''' places himself onto the ground and interrupts {{tip|airborne|displacements}} affecting him upon casting ''Bellow's Breath''.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Ornn''' is performing ''Bellows Breath'':

e1.name: Searing Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|charges}} a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.

If '''Ornn''' collides with terrain while charging he creates a shockwave upon impact that deals the same damage to nearby enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once by ''Searing Charge''.
The shockwave destroys the pillar formed by {{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn}} and partially destroys [[terrain]] created by enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn charges a fixed distance in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.
If Ornn collides with terrain while charging he creates a shockwave upon impact that deals the same damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up and stuns them for 1.25 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once by Searing Charge.
The shockwave destroys the pillar formed by Volcanic Rupture and partially destroys terrain created by enemy champions.
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} may only block one instance of damage.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} prevents the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} as well as the {{tip|stun}} from being applied.
* {{tip|Brittle}} enemies without {{tip|Tenacity}} of their own will be {{tip|stun|stunned}} for a total of {{fd|1.625}} seconds.
* ''Searing Charge'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* '''Ornn''' will not initiate the {{tip|dash}} after the cast time if he's being {{tip|airborne|displaced}}.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 40% bonus armor) (+ 40% bonus magic resistance)

r1.name: Call of the Forge God
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' sounds his horn over the cast time, after which a lava elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for {{tt|3000 range|estimated}} at increasing speed, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. The {{tip|slow}} scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, down to a minimum of 10%.
''Call of the Forge God'' can be recast after {{tt|{{fd|1.25}}|Includes the cast time}} seconds while the elemental is active.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} 300 units in the target direction, though not through terrain. If '''Ornn''' collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction, dealing the same damage to enemies within its path and additionally {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second, reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the first enemy {{tip|champion}} hit.
Each pass applies {{tip|Brittle}} to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, after which a lava elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for 3000 range at increasing speed, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path and slowing them for 2 seconds. The slow scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, down to a minimum of 10%.
Call of the Forge God can be recast after 1.25 seconds while the elemental is active.
Recast: Ornn dashes 300 units in the target direction, though not through terrain. If Ornn collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction, dealing the same damage to enemies within its path and additionally knocking them up and stunning them for 1 second, reduced to 0.5 seconds after the first enemy champion hit.
Each pass applies Brittle to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125|175|225}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|250|350|450}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}{{st|Maximum Slow|{{ap|40|60|80}}%}}
r1.notes:
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Call of the Forge God'' cannot be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* {{tip|Brittle}} enemies without {{tip|Tenacity}} of their own will be {{tip|stun|stunned}} for a total of {{fd|1.3}} seconds.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} may only block one pass.
* ''Call of the Forge God'' will fire from wherever '''Ornn''' was at the start of the cast time.
